Name: Google Spotlight Stories: Age of Sail
About the game: Age of Sail VR is the story of William Avery (Ian McShane), an old sailor adrift and alone in the North Atlantic. When Avery rescues Lara, who has mysteriously fallen overboard, he finds redemption and hope in his darkest hours. Official selection Venice Film Festival. Directed by ACADEMY AWARD-winning filmmaker John Kahrs. Produced in collaboration with Chromosphere and Evil Eye Pictures for EMMY Award-winning Google Spotlight Stories.
